p: Phytohormone balance is also involved in priming and plant defense induction mechanisms. Monoterpenoids are able to activate defense genes by signaling processes and Ca 2+ influx causes by membrane depolarization, protein phosphorylation/dephosphorylation and the action of ROS [ 89]. This gene expression can either lead to priming (an accelerated gene-response to biotic stress) or direct defense elicitations.
